metadata.name: The Bearlorian
metadata.description:
The Bearlorian is a lone gunfighter in the outer reaches of the galaxy far from the authority of The Market. Different from his kind, he's been trying to help the Jebulls, to once again turn the tides for The Crypto Republic.

In these darkest moments, the lines between good and evil are blurred. 

Who's going to awake the force?
